sub_title:
International and National  Business Developer 
Consultant Exotic fruit Mangoes - Tangerine - Grape - Banana Organic - Avocado / Representative of fruit and vegetable producers in Peru, Chile and South America
summary:
I graduated in 1991 in Politic Sciences and Master in Foreign Commerce since then I have worked in Banking, Logistics  and Transport National and International ( By Land, by sea and By air ) .
I have experience in working in the logistics, supply chain  and service transport (Fresh goods/Frozen goods). 

With more than 15 years of experience in Italy (Milan), I am very skillful in to create to trustful relations with the customers, colleagues of work and providers, good comunication skills, in tough decision-making, problem solving, good negotiation skills, good planification skills, good organization skills, , good, skills in sales tecniques, among other.

I would like to stress that I have vast knowledge in oprations import/export, transport by land, air and sea, logistics , outgoing loads and ingoing, planning daily of the organizer of the trucks, manage own and providers for the services transport, manage the drivers and co-drivers, negotiation price, available and routes, negotiate with freight forwarder and another companies transport, and I have experience with the use of various software programs applicable to the profession.

Morover, I excel in the following areas: Planing daily transport, manage the drivers and people equipment, warehousing, contact clients, contact transport providers, planning loads and unloads respect to the timetable, contact permanent with customer service and sales, among other.  

My experience has been gained both in  South America and Europe and I have worked  in Argentina, Brasil, Mexico, Peru, Colombia and EU ( Italy, Spain and Netherlands ).
